Question & Options:
What are the relationships and actions depicted among the characters in *Whiplash*?
Options:
A. A) Jim supports Andrew after a tough performance.
B. B) Andrew is expelled from Shaffer due to a conflict with Fletcher.
C. C) Fletcher seeks revenge on Andrew during a performance.
D. D) Jim and Fletcher are in a rivalry.
Correct Answer: A) Jim supports Andrew after a tough performance., B) Andrew is expelled from Shaffer due to a conflict with Fletcher., C) Fletcher seeks revenge on Andrew during a performance.
